Installation
============

The following libraries are required:

    * python 2.7
    * python-setuptools
    * selenium (tested with: 2.40)

        .. code-block:: bash

            easy_install selenium
            

Installation of python 2.7:

Visit following website: https://www.python.org/download/releases/2.7/ 
and download interested format. After that install python 2.7 on your machine.


Installation of python-setuptools:

Visit following website: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/setuptools#installing-and-using-setuptools
and follow the instructions.


Installation of selenium:

Visit following website: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/selenium
and follow the instructions.
